titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Educational Cookery Collection, 1880-1969, n.d.
titlestmt.subtitle: Educational Cookery Collection Ms2017-032

publicationstmt.date: Â©2017 By Virginia Tech. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2017-10-12 08:41:07-0400

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2017-032

defitem.label: Processed by: Kira A. Dietz, Archivist,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The Educational Cookery Collection includes flyers, pamphlets, cooking school catalogs, recipes, menus, cookery lessons, and other ephemera relating to cookery and education, dating from the 1880s to the 1960s.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Educational Cookery Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Educational Cookery Collection, Ms2017-032, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Educational Cookery Collection was purchased by Special Collections in April 2017. Additional materials may be added in the future.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Educational Cookery Collection was completed in Octobter 2017.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Educational Cookery Collection includes flyers, pamphlets, cooking school catalogs, recipes, menus, cookery lessons, and other ephemera relating to cookery and education, dating from the 1880s to the 1960s. Materials represent the work of individual authors, corporations, government and extension agencies, cooking schools, and other organizations that sponsored educational cookery events.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Most items have a clear source (author, corporate author, publisher, or other sponsoring organization). This collection is arranged in alphabetical order by creator, with a small group of unattributed items at the end. Each letter of the alphabet represented has its own folder and items within each folder are alphabetical order by creator. Each folder has a bibliography of items with either a title or a brief description (when a clear title was absent).

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials (Books)
separatedmaterial.p: This collection included a large number of books and publications which were cataloged for the Rare Book Collection. Books are listed below in chronological order with undated materials at the end. Catalog records include a note that indicate they are part of the collection. If a book is connected to a particular educational culinary education organization, it is noted in brackets following the title and date.
